page.title: 05Recreation
page.content: Children may play in the many open places, as well as the official recreation areas, with facilities such as swings,climbing frames etc. There is a leisure centre, in the former Ambassador College,where you can play badminton,indoor football, and basketball.There is an indoor swimming pool and sauna, as well as tennis courts and a running track. All of the houses have good-sized gardens,which are well-cared for, as gardening is popular.The many clubs cater for a large variety of interests, so the adults can always find something to do. People also use leisure centres in the nearby towns of Watford and St.Albans.
